name: Hayaku Obaasan!
description:
Hayaku Obaasan an endless elder runner!

Run with our obaasan. Run the longest distance you can! She knows that the secret of a healthy life is to exercise.

  • Click to jump. 
  • Click while on air to double jump.
  • Click after the double jump to stomp and land quickly. 

Control obaasan position with these moves. Consume matcha to increase speed!

Mobile Experience

For a better experience on your android, we recommend you to download and install it. Android 6.0 and above are supported.

Future Improvements

  • iOS version
  • New content to be added
  • Bug fixes
